title: Went to face check a bush as twitch when against an Ez and Blitz

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
The gif sums it up pretty well XD.

I forgot i was vs a blitz as the last ban the support (my support) selected blitz but didn't ban him, and i kept through out the game thinking he was banned and not picked (Because i am sick atm and it messes with my memory..)

Boy how much i hate blitz.. a good blitz makes you hate your self, an amazing blitz makes you want to give up on life.

replies.body:
I main blitzy, its great fun to troll the start like stealing blue, or waiting for the enemy to finishing leashing gromp and come bot after the wave is already there, and pull them into the bush where your adc is waiting, exhaust and either get the kill or force an early back.
His rocket grab is just so much fun to surprise someone with xD
Yeah his such a pain like that XD. This is why i ban him every time i play twitch. His so damn strong against twitch.
Yeah he can be, but twitch is also a shifty bugger and I find it hard to get my hands on a good twitch he dissapears too easy.

Always ward tri if his on blue side. Or just south of it a little. Good twitches like my self will start stealth around there if the lane is half way pushed, or ward his bush closest to tower, most will run back and start stealth, so it looks like they are backing or running back for something but they are actually stealthing so you best back and prepare. Most twitch players don't put more than one point into Q so if you just move back for a tick it will fade by the time he gets close or past his minions then you just grab him and mess his day up. 

Also just knowing that he can appear at any time is smart to remember.. After all he is an assassin ADC. TBH i would actually mark him as an assassin before ADC though they consider primary assassins melee over range.
